LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_Rings.label: avali ear rings
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_Rings.description: Just a few rings for ears.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_HeadWraps.label: avali head wraps
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_Scarf.label: scarf
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_Scarf.description: A nice thick wooly scarf, perfect for a cold day on Avalon.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_Cap.label: avali cap
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_Headset.label: avali headset
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_Headset.description: Little more than a robust headset and microphone.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_ScoutHUD.label: avali scout's HUD
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_ScoutHUD.description: A lightweight headset HUD popular amongst explorers.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_LightCombatHelmet.label: avali light combat helmet
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_LightCombatHelmet.descript: A simple helmet which gives moderate protection against sharp attacks. Not effective against blunt weapons.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_GuardianHelmet.label: avali "Guardian" combat helmet
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_GuardianHelmet.description: The Guardian combat helmet is the is equivalent to wearing a tank on your head, massive, heavy and ungodly scary.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_CombatHelmet.label: avali combat helmet
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_CombatHelmet.description: The standard for Avali power armors, the balance between armor and advanced technology.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_CombatHelmetElite.label: elite avali combat helmet
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_CombatHelmetElite.descript: The standard for Avali power armors, the balance between armor and advanced technology. \n\nThis one was painted to have a comsic look.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_HellcatHelmet.label: avali "Hellcat" combat helmet
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_HellcatHelmet.description: The combat helmet is a complete upgrade from the standard design, with more advanced tracking hardware, advanced AI, and the bouns of a completed personal psychic shield. But PR wasnt too keen on the idea of the design.
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_HellcatHelmetElite.label: elite avali "Hellcat"combat helmet
LanguageData.Avali_Apparel_HellcatHelmetElite.descrip: The combat helmet is a complete upgrade from the standard design, with more advanced tracking hardware, advanced AI, and the bouns of a completed personal psychic shield. But PR was keen on the idea of the design, thinking a dark red with orange was a good idea.
